resources.string: Ready to level up? Each click gets you closer to greatness! You\'ve clicked %s times and counting. Keep clicking and watch your power grow!

As an Ascendant Being, you wield unimaginable power over the cosmos. It\'s time to make a choice: Do you wish to Reset Existence and start anew, or Forge a New Reality and shape the future? The fate of the universe lies in your hands.

You have conjured forth a new realm in a mere %s milliseconds, yet alas, the effort has drained all your mystical energies. Now, you must embark on your journey anew, starting from the very beginning.
Your attempt to forge a new universe has faltered
Forging a new universe please wait this might take some time…

In a daring feat, you obliterated your universe in %s, yet the creation of a new one drained you entirely. Now, bereft of your arcane might, you must begin anew, a humble seeker in the vast expanse of possibilities.
Despite your efforts, the cosmos resists your command.
Resetting existence please wait this might take some time…
